title: How long does it take to develop a business website?
description: The average development time for a business website is between 4 to 8 weeks, depending on the complexity of the project and the specific requirements of the client.

title: What services are included in business website creation?
description: We offer a comprehensive range of services, including website design and development, responsive layout, integration with CRM and other systems, SEO optimization, and basic training on website management.

title: Can I order a custom design for my website?
description: Yes, we create custom designs tailored to the specifics of your business and brand. Our designers work with you at every stage to ensure a personalized approach.

title: Do you provide technical support after the project is completed?
description: Yes, we offer technical support and maintenance after the website launch. This includes updates, bug fixes, and consultations on website operations.

title: What platforms do you use for developing business websites?
description: We work with popular platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, and others, and we can also create a custom website from scratch based on the client's unique requirements.
